review_data.title: Friendly early morning staff
review_data.content: My early morning visit to Kuhn (Albisriederplatz) was a very good experience. The staff was smiling, super friendly and welcoming even as they were busy baking and filling the display cases with delicious products such as fresh breads, pastries, sandwiches, quiches, torts, muesli, hot/cold beverages...More

review_data.title: Great breakfast find
review_data.content: We walked in for breakfast and saw the wonderful breads and pastries, salads and sandwiches that went well with our cappuccinos. Our hotel is less than 500 meters away. Though it seemed like a Swiss version of Starbucks (which I normally avoid), the friendly staff,...More

review_data.title: Excellent staff & great selection of food
review_data.content: We found this nice restaurant near our hotel and were immediately attracted by its wide variety of food and drinks. The staff were very friendly and helpful and always with a smile on their face. Free Wi-Fi was also available. We preferred to have breakfast...More

review_data.title: A well needed new, impressive cafe at Albisriederplatz
review_data.content: I visited the newest Cafe Kuhn at Albisriederplatz just two days after their grand opening. I can report only an excellent visit overall. The front space displays an impressive assortment of their fresh breads, pastries, sandwiches, quiches, muesli, hot/cold beverages, lots of retail items and...More
